topicRef.description: GTS ID of the topic/stream where events of this type are published.

type.description: Identifier of the event type in GTS format.

$schema.description: Link to the event type schema.

tenantId.description: The id of the tenant that produced the event. Mandatory

userId.description: The id of the user that produced the event. Optional

clientId.description: The id of the API client that produced the event. Optional

source.description: Full SemVer of the event type schema used to produce this event.

occurredAt.description: The time the event occurred. Fully controlled by the producer

ingestedAt.description: The time the event was ingested into the event store.

sequenceNumber.description: The sequence number of the event in the stream.

previousSequenceNumber.description: The sequence number of the previous event in the same stream.

payload.description: Type-specific body; see event type schema.

subjectType.description: GTS type of the subject of the event.
subjectType.$comment: The value is mandatory if subject is present
